hours: Tuesday: 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM Thursday: 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM Saturday: 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM
materials: Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Plastic #3 (PVC); Plastic #4 (LDPE); Plastic #5 (Polypropylene); Aluminum Cans; Books (Reuse); Glass (Brown); Brush; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Cardboard; Christmas Trees; Glass (Clear); Ferrous Metals (Steel or Iron); Grass Clippings; Greeting Cards; Leaves; Needles / Medical Sharps; Mercury Containing Items; Paper (Mixed); Packing Peanut (Reuse); Batteries (Rechargeable); Tin or Steel Cans; Laser Toner Cartridges; Tree Trimmings; Used Motor Oil; Oil Filters; Used Tires
notes:
Residents and businesses of Amherst, Pelham, and Shutesbury may use this facility with the purchase of an annual vehicle sticker.  Located on Route 9, two miles east of the Dunkin Doughnuts on College Road.  
Disposal fees apply to some items.   Fees must be paid with cash or check (no credit cards accepted).

name: Amherst HHW Collection
materials: Glue & Adhesives; Ammunition; Antifreeze; Asbestos; Brake Fluid; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Compact Fluorescent Lights; Degreasers; Explosives; Fertilizer; Fluorescent Lamps/Tubes; Freon Removal; Fungicides; Gasoline and Unwanted Fuels; Herbicides; Household Cleaners; Insecticides; Needles / Medical Sharps; Mercury Containing Items; Ni-Cd Batteries; Unused Paint; Paint Thinner; Pesticides; Photography Chemicals; Pool Chemicals; Propane Tanks; Batteries (Rechargeable); Smoke Detector; Solvents; Transmission Fluid; Used Motor Oil
notes:
Located on Route 9, two miles east of the Dunkin Doughnuts on College Road.

This household hazardous waste collection opportunity is held twice annually (late April and late September) and is open to Amherst and Pelham residents.  Based on annual agreements with neighboring towns, residents of Leverett and Shutesbury may also participate.  Pre-registration is required.  Fees apply for oil and latex paint only.  Event dates are announced 4-6 weeks in advance.  Visit town website or call 413-259-3050 for details.
